name: Lilypad
description: Lilypad allows parents to easily share information with temporary caregivers, such as nannies, babysitters, or family members who might be watching over their children.

name: Employee Directory
description: A MERN application which displays user data such as name, email, and gender, and their photo, and allows users to search and/or sort on various categories.

name: Jinji
description: Jinji is a full-stack Human Resources application which employs mySQL, Sequelize, Express, and Node to manage employee info like allergies, birthdays, work start dates, etc and inform Management decision-making and planning.

name: Eat A Burger!
description: This app works with mySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, and ORM to serve users burgers which they can delete, devour, and cook from scratch.

name: Employee Management System
description: This Employee Management Command Line Interface allow users to manage and update a mySQL database from the command line, using prompts like 'update employee', 'add employee', etc.

name: noted!
description: Write things down with noted! This application works with the Express server to provide a simple, note-taking interface for users. Add notes, update exiting notes, and delete notes!

name: Employee Summary
description: This CLI application prompts the user for information about their employees, then dynamically creates a 'team' page, with information depending on their title as engineer, manager, or intern.

name: README Generator
description: This CLI application requests information about the user's project, then uses their prompt responses to generate a well-structured README file for their project.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: Organize your workday using one, simple interface that allows users to easily add and remove meetings, events, and tasks hour by hour as they go about their day. Elements display differently depending on current moment.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This simple weather dashboard allows users to search cities by zip code, then displays the current weather in that area, as well as the projected weather over the next five days.

name: YipPEE
description: Integrating Zomato and RefugeeRestroom APIs, this application lets you search for restaurants in the area, then provides clear information about the ADA and gender-neutral accessibility of their bathrooms.

name: Password Generator
description: Simple, but useful! This app let's you define the requirements for your new password and spits one out that's sure to be both unique and secure. (But have fun trying to remember it...)
